content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a 10year legal case the tribunal made a final ruling on the case which involved parties named cg lma lmg and lml the court declared lml in default and deemed the claim for receivership fallimento lama di lml inadmissible the court also declared the counterclaims made by the receiver taxable additionally the court accepted the application for the judicial division of the deceased lmgs property and assigned shares to the coheirs the court discussed the legality of the curatorship proceeding identified the assets in the estate determined the formation and allocation of shares clarified the accounting procedure and addressed the opening of the succession and testamentary dispositions made by the deceased the court also determined the allocation of shares discussed judgment costs and compensation for the trustee the ruling was made on february 4 2013 in nocera inferiore

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Nocera Inferiore sez. II, 08/02/2013, n.108
